Body:
"""Test extracting users from hass config."""
mopen = mock_open(read_data=json.dumps({'key': 'auth', 'version': 1, 'data':
    {'users': [{'id': 'mock-user-id', 'name': 'mock-user-name'}],
    'refresh_tokens': [{'id': 'mock-refresh-id', 'user_id': 'mock-user-id',
    'client_name': 'mock-client-name', 'client_id': 'mock-client-id'}]}}))
with patch('detective.auth.open', mopen):
    auth = Auth('/some/path')
assert auth.users == {'mock-user-id': {'id': 'mock-user-id', 'name':
    'mock-user-name'}}
assert auth.refresh_tokens == {'mock-refresh-id': {'id': 'mock-refresh-id',
    'user': auth.users['mock-user-id'], 'client_id': 'mock-client-id',
    'client_name': 'mock-client-name'}}
